00081  Uint16 UHPI_HWOB_Getstatus(CSL_UhpiHandle hUhpi)
00082 {
00083 
00084     /* Extract the HWOB bit */
00085     return((Uint16)(CSL_FEXT(hUhpi->Regs->UHPICL,UHPI_UHPICL_HWOB)));

00087 }

00115 static inline
00116  void UHPI_hostTOdspInterrupt_Generate(CSL_UhpiHandle hUhpi)
00117 {
00118     /* Generate the DSP interrupt */
00119     CSL_FINST(hUhpi->Regs->UHPICL, UHPI_UHPICL_DSP_INT, GENERATE);
00120 }
